channel.title: GUys Please read
channel.description: Ok, so I have a source file and I have done every step to make a server. But when I go on the moparscape webclient it dosnt do anything with my no-ip adress does it? How do I link my no-ip to my source so that people can go on clients and type in my server ip and get on it???? Because I dont think you need anything but a source to play on the moparscape client? Can somebody please help. Even if a person has already posted I would appreciate your opinion plx

item.title: GUys Please read
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Well, for if u did’t understand that:

  1. Did u portforward (Don’t forgot to set up an static ip if u didn’t)?
  2. Did u open port in firewall?
  3. Did u change the IP in files in your source?

Read full topic

item.title: GUys Please read
item.dc:creator: @Eson Eson
item.description:
@Eson wrote:

made no-ip opened an exeption in firewall have no-ip DUC port forwarded if needed ? changed ip of your source to yours?

Read full topic

item.title: GUys Please read

item.description:
